It's Nice To Meet You

Main Observation: Jujube Tree

This tree is a jujube tree. I only recently learned the name for it. In Vietnamese we call it trái táo tàu. A direct translation for that is Chinese apple. The burnt red fruit it produces is succulent and sweet. It is almost boggling to think about how a fruit that tastes like that comes from a tree that looks like this.

Mourning Dove

Zenaida macroura

A dove built a nest outside of our house! It is nested by our front door. My mom discovered it while sweeping and wondering where all the twigs on the floor came from. There was also a small broken egg on the floor, maybe the size of a golf ball. We are just leaving it alone for now.

  • Client: Southwest
  • Category: Website Design
